item.title: Just come here real quick
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

all i want to do is if they try to open the chest (case 10284) that it deletes the item (989) and if they dont have item(989) then they can’t get the stuff from the chest heres what i ahve so far

[code]case 10284:

if(playerHasItemAmount(989, 1)){
addItem(randomKA(),1);

}else if(playerHasItemAmount(989, 0)) {
sendMessage(“you dont”);

}

break;[/code]

any ideas??
